CustomerGatewayId.description: The ID of the customer gateway.

DryRun.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request, and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation. Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

Options.description: Indicates whether the VPN connection requires static routes. If you are creating a VPN connection for a device that does not support BGP, you must specify true. Default: false

VpnGatewayId.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway.
